short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View available grade data (from VA Grades) for classes on Lou's List

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This simple extension injects available grade data for each class directly into Lou's List's (https://louslist.org/). View grade distributions at the click of a button rather than having to continuously switch between tabs when picking classes!

Credits:
-Icons made by Srip: https://www.flaticon.com/authors/srip
